interpretation: The "teddy bear" card represents comfort, protection, and innocence. It signifies a need for emotional security and a desire to feel safe and nurtured. This card may indicate a need for self-care and self-soothing, or a longing for someone or something to provide that care and comfort. It can also represent the need to let go of past traumas and embrace a sense of childlike wonder and innocence. Associated keywords include warmth, softness, childhood, comfort, and protection. This card encourages you to embrace your vulnerability and seek out sources of comfort and security in your life. It may also suggest that you need to be more nurturing and caring towards others, or that you may benefit from seeking the care and support of others. Ultimately, the "teddy bear" card reminds you that it is okay to need comfort and security, and that seeking out these things is a natural part of the human experience.
